text: geuleoja moseneun keuge hwaleul naego seulpeohamyeo geuui baegseong-egelo dol awa baegseongdeul-iyeo junimkkeseo joh-eun yagsog-eul haji anhhaessdeonyo geu yagsog-ineohuiege olaedoen geos gat-i boyeossdeo nyo animyeon junim-ui hwaga neohuiege naelyeojigileul wonhaessneunyo neohuineun nawaui yagsog-eul kkaetteulyeossnola
